text: Tedi Medi Family is an Indian sitcom television series, which premiered on 8 June 2015 and is broadcast on BIG Magic. The series is adaptation of Warner Bros' The Middle. Reliance Broadcast Network had acquired the adaptation rights of the series. The series is produced by Mautik Tulip of Bodhi Tree Productions. The series is about a working-class family. The series is produced as a single-camera comedy and follows the daily commotion of raising a family, in the middle of life. ==Cast== * Ami Trivedi as Anjali Khurana (Mother) * Iqbal Azad as Vivek Khurana (Father) * Sushant Mohindru as Shanky Khurana (Eldest son) * Saloni Daini as Suhani Khurana (Daughter) * Dharmik Joisar as Veer Khurana (Youngest son) * Manav Soneji as Vicky * Varun Badola as Vivek's friend ==References== ==External links== Category:The Middle (TV series) Category:2015 Indian television series debuts Category:2015 Indian television series endings Category:Indian television series based on American television series Category:Hindi-language television shows Category:Indian television sitcoms Category:BIG Magic original programming
title: Tedi Medi Family
